Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards. This exceptional item not only boasts a range of innovative features but also comes with a comprehensive satisfaction guarantee. Given its quality and the benefits it offers, I believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering its true worth and the value it can bring to you, I kindly propose a price of $200 for this product. I trust that this offer reflects the value we place on this item while providing you with an opportunity to acquire something truly special. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
